items.name: Small Healing Potion
items.description: A small vial containing a red liquid that can heal minor wounds, restoring up to 10 health points.

items.name: Wolf Fang
items.description: A sharp fang from a wolf. Useful for crafting basic weapons and talismans.

items.name: Copper Coin
items.description: A basic unit of currency. Not worth much on its own, but they add up.

items.name: Crude Dagger
items.description: A roughly made dagger. It's not much, but it's better than bare hands.
